pkgmetadata.longdescription: A screencast tool to display your keys, inspired by Screenflick. Featuring: several keyboard translation methods, key composition/input method support, configurable font/size/position, highlighting of recent keystrokes, improved backspace processing, normal/Emacs/Mac caps modes, multi-monitor support, dynamic recording control, switch for visible shift and modifier sequences only, repeats compression, countless bug fixes, mouse buttons support.
